properties.address: Penarth Methodist Church, Woodland Place, Penarth , CF642EX
properties.description: A warm welcome awaits everyone in a friendly safe environment . Stay as long as you wish while we are open, enjoy complimentary hot drinks/toast/teacakes and from 12 noon complimentary soup &roll. Wi-fi, mobile phone charging, TV, newspapers & books all available .Chat or enjoy a quiet space.
properties.title: Penarth Methodist Church

properties.description: Youth Club ONLY available for Yr6-Yr8 from Llandough School
properties.title: Landough Out Loud Youth Club at Llandough School

properties.address: THE SALVATION ARMY, 101A PLASSEY STREET, PENARTH, CF64 1EL
properties.description:
Craft Group - a safe warm space to share company and conversation and bring or learn a craft.
Soup and a Roll drop in - a safe warm space to share company and a basic hot meal.

hours._text:
Monday 13:00 - 15:00 - Craft Group.

Wednesday from 12:00 - Soup and a roll drop in

properties.title: The Salvation Army Penarth

properties.address: Tabernacle Baptist Church Plassey Street Penarth Vale of Glamorgan CF64 1EN
properties.description:
Join us at Tabernacle Baptist Church for a warm welcome this winter from January 5th 2023. Chat, play board games, read , use the free wifi or just do your own thing. All free of charge!
Thursday - Complimentary Soup & Hot drinks available.
Sunday - Service 10:30am, Coffee 11:45am, Afternoon together 13:00 - 17:00 (Lunch at 13:15)
properties.title: Tabernacle Baptist Church

properties.address: PENARTH LIBRARY, STANWELL ROAD, PENARTH, CF64 2YT
properties.description:
- Free computer and Internet access with scanning and printing available - Free WiFi - Newspapers and magazines - Local history collection
- Feel Good Friday session 14:00 - 16:00 (social group for adults, refreshments provided) - Knit2gether is every Thursday from 14:30 onwards
- Digital champion session every Wednesday 10:00 - 1:00 (Come to discuss digital issues with our champion)
- Sight Cymru Reading Group every second Friday of the month.
- Reading group every third Friday of the month. Complimentary refreshments will be offered at all of these sessions.
properties.title: Penarth Library
